entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1 except plus 5 over southern sections. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. High plus 1 except plus 5 over southern sections. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
